analyzed: hetu sa hetuka duka ādi kusala ttika

original: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo
analyzed: na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na kusalaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca
analyzed: na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na ca hetu na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetuñca iva na ahetukañca

original: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo ca naahetuko ceva nana
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetuko ca na kusalo ca na ahetuko ca iva na

original: ca hetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca hetu na kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na ahetukam ca iva na na ca hetum na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na ca hetu na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalañca naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca na kusalam ca na ahetukam ca iva na na ca hetum na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca na akusalam dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum ca iva na ahetukam ca na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
hetuyā nava pe avigate nava vipākam natthi
